title: Зелёный фургон
overview: The original continuation of the popular two-part detective-adventure television film "The Green Van" (1983), which was set in Soviet Odessa in the 1920s.1946 year. After 20 years, all in the same Odessa, matured Volodya Patrikeev continues to fight crime. After serving in prison in 1937, having won in the penal battalion, and then in reconnaissance, he returns to civilian life and begins to investigate complex criminal cases under the direction of a completely "green" sergeant Zhenya Krasavin ... Their first, insignificant, investigation of surrogate vodka that flooded the city, leads detectives to the very top, to Moscow. And, if they do not stop the criminals, the biggest geopolitical scandal could break out ...
